name: Homelessness Prevention
description: Emergency shelters and transitional housing referrals for at-risk families, people in recovery and ex -offenders transitioning back into the community and providing shelter for nearly 300 homeless individuals and families nightly.
fullDescription: Emergency shelters and transitional housing referrals for at-risk families, people in recovery and ex -offenders transitioning back into the community and providing shelter for nearly 300 homeless individuals and families nightly.
whatTheyOffer: Emergency shelters and transitional housing referrals for at-risk families, people in recovery and ex -offenders transitioning back into the community and providing shelter for nearly 300 homeless individuals and families nightly.
howToGetIt: Call or Email TCDC for more information about their programs and services
